I tried with hive ver 0.14 and 1.2 and the issue exists. I will add those two versions to affects version.
Also the issue does not exist if hive.execution.engine=tez.

This seems to be a bug in columnPruner.
[~nbrenwald] are you working on this?
If not i could take a look at this.
Hi [~jpullokkaran] no I haven't had time to work on this, if you could take a look that would be great.
Attached initial exploratory patch.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12770892 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

[~jpullokkaran] Shall we commit .1 patch in interim till we have more complete fix via HIVE-12361 & HIVE-12355 
Only downside I see is we will add an avoidable select operator in tree, but this atleast will prevent throwing up an error.
On Master ".1" patch is not sufficient as IdentityProjectRemover would remove the select.
What is the status of this?
Removing fixed version (2.0) from Unresolved JIRA in preparation for the release. Please use target version field instead (if not already set) if you think this should be shipped as part of 2.0

Patch needs to be revised and is blocked by  HIVE-12355.
I hope to get to it in next week or so.

[~jpullokkaran] Little confused here. Original bug report in description says reported issue *doesn't* happen on master, only on branch-1 and earlier. You commented earlier on this jira saying patch you have is not sufficient for master. But, there is no issue on master as per bug report. For branch-1 and earlier ".1" patch should suffice as per your comment. 
So, not sure whats keeping us from resolving this jira? Do you have a repro query to trigger this on master?
There is an issue on master too; but is kind of doesn't get exposed due to some optimizations.
This is no more an issue on master been fixed by HIVE-12008.

[~jcamachorodriguez] Could you review the patch ?
Patch is for branch-1
+1 pending QA run.
